unnormalised: The transfer window has been quite active, especially with players moving before the Ranji Trophy season. I'm curious about Mohun Bagan's strategy regarding midfielders. Will they look to bolster their ranks with someone from the North-East? I hope the management doesn't make a "Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham"-level dramatic blunder by letting go of key players for peanuts. The Rs. 50 Lakh transfer fee seems undervalued in today's market for players covering 10+ km per game.
normalised: The transfer window has been quite active, especially with players moving before the Ranji Trophy season. I am curious about Mohun Bagan's strategy regarding midfielders. Will they look to bolster their ranks with someone from the North-East? I hope the management doesn't make a "Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham"-level dramatic blunder by letting go of key players for peanuts. The rupee fifty lakh transfer fee seems undervalued in today's market for players covering ten plus kilometer per game.
